document_data.name: Brynna
document_data.mainbody:
'''Brynna''' was a young woman from the [[Western Heartlands]] who joined the [[Cult of the Absolute]] during the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].

{{Quote|You're a [[True Soul]]. You can't die. ''Please'' stay with us.|Brynna, to a dying [[Edowin]].}}
document_data.Relationships: Brynna and her companion [[Andrick]] were followers of the [[True Soul]] [[Edowin]]. They were wholly devoted to the man who they viewed as some form of [[chosen]].
document_data.History:
In the {{YearlinkName|1492}}, Brynna, Andrick and Edowin were tasked with fighting a group of "fugitives" of the Absolute, individuals that were imprisoned aboard a [[mind flayer]] [[Nautiloid]] that crashed near the [[River Chionthar]]. Unbeknownst to Brynna and Andrick, their true goal was to retrieve a ''[[mysterious artifact]]'' for the Absolute.

Unfortunately for the trio, Edowin was mortally wounded by an [[owlbear]] and left to die in the forest.
